title: Naga mage
data:
***Version [0.27](/0.27 "0.27")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all nagas, see [list of nagas](/List_of_nagas "List of nagas").*

| naga mage N [![Naga mage.png](/images/2/23/Naga_mage.png)](/File:Naga_mage.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                  | 25-52                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                      | 7                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                  | 443                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                         | 10 (move: 140%)                                                                                                                                                                |

| Attack1                                                                         | 17 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                              |
| Attack2                                                                         | 4 ([constrict](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [crush](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                         | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                                                     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A naga that has trained in the use of magic, trailed by an eldritch nimbus. It is especially skilled in spells dealing with poison and venom.***“Amongst the deities and Asuras and celestial Rishis, O amiable lady, the Nagas are endued with great energy. Possessed of great speed, they are endued again with excellent fragrance. They deserve to be worshipped. They are capable of granting boons. Indeed, we too deserve to be followed by others in our train. I tell thee, O lady, that we are incapable of being seen by human beings.” -Mahābhārata, Santi Parva, Mokshadharma Parva, section CCCLX. ca. 500 B.C. trans. Kisari Mohan Ganguli, 1883. |

**Naga magi** are skilled [venom mages](/Venom_mage "Venom mage"), but make competent physical combatants as well. Often found in packs with other nagas, they're a bigger threat than most things in the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit"), but [guardian serpents](/Guardian_serpent "Guardian serpent") and [nagarajas](/Nagaraja "Nagaraja") should be a higher priority.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                             |                                                                                                           |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Spit Poison](/Spit_Poison "Spit Poison") (d12)             | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") (3d12)               | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                       |
| Slot3       | [Concentrate Venom](/Concentrate_Venom "Concentrate Venom") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                       |
| Slot4       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                                     | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                       |

## Tips & Tricks

- Poison resistance and high AC will significantly reduce the damage potential of their offensive spells.
- Their Concentrate Venom imbues their allies' poisonous attacks with [curare](/Curare "Curare")-level poison.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), naga magi could cast [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance"), [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow"), and [Teleport Other](/Teleport_Other "Teleport Other"), but did not know [Concentrate Venom](/Concentrate_Venom "Concentrate Venom").
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), naga magi had [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") instead of [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance").
html:
Naga mage

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all nagas, see list of nagas.

naga mage N 
HP 25-52
HD 7
XP 443
Speed 10 (move: 140%)
AC 6
EV 10
Will 60
Attack1 17 (hit: plain)
Attack2 4 (constrict: crush)


Resistances rPois+
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type naga, naga
Flags See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A naga that has trained in the use of magic, trailed by an eldritch nimbus. It is especially skilled in spells dealing with poison and venom.

“Amongst the deities and Asuras and celestial Rishis, O amiable lady, the Nagas are endued with great energy. Possessed of great speed, they are endued again with excellent fragrance. They deserve to be worshipped. They are capable of granting boons. Indeed, we too deserve to be followed by others in our train. I tell thee, O lady, that we are incapable of being seen by human beings.”
-Mahābhārata, Santi Parva, Mokshadharma Parva, section CCCLX. ca. 500 B.C.
trans. Kisari Mohan Ganguli, 1883.

Naga magi are skilled venom mages, but make competent physical combatants as well. Often found in packs with other nagas, they're a bigger threat than most things in the Snake Pit, but guardian serpents and nagarajas should be a higher priority.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Spit Poison (d12) Natural flag,
Breath flag
Slot2 Venom Bolt (3d12) Wizard flag
Slot3 Concentrate Venom Wizard flag
Slot4 Haste Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Poison resistance and high AC will significantly reduce the damage potential of their offensive spells.
  • Their Concentrate Venom imbues their allies' poisonous attacks with curare-level poison.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, naga magi could cast Force Lance, Poison Arrow, and Teleport Other, but did not know Concentrate Venom.
  • Prior to 0.25, naga magi had Iskenderun's Mystic Blast instead of Force Lance.
